definition: sympathetic compatibility, to allow to have
details:
noun
- sympathetic compatibility
- a written agreement between two states or sovereigns
= synonyms: treaty, pact
- concurrence of opinion
= example: concurrence of opinion
= synonyms: accordance
- harmony of people's opinions or actions or characters
= synonyms: agreement
verb
- to allow to have
= example: to allow to have
= synonyms: grant
- to go together
= example: to go together
= synonyms: concord, consort, harmonize, harmonise, agree, fit in
